.sprite {
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    display: block;
}

.sprite--icon-basket {
    width: 15px;
    height: 15px;
    background-position: -5px -5px;
}

.sprite-checkbox-off-png-copy {
    width: 23px;
    height: 23px;
    background-position: -5px -30px;
}

.sprite-checkbox-on-png-copy {
    width: 27px;
    height: 23px;
    background-position: -5px -63px;
}

.sprite-fb-icon-png-copy {
    width: 12px;
    height: 22px;
    background-position: -5px -96px;
}

.sprite-insta-icon-png-copy {
    width: 21px;
    height: 21px;
    background-position: -5px -128px;
}

.sprite-radio-off-png-copy {
    width: 25px;
    height: 25px;
    background-position: -5px -159px;
}

.sprite-radio-on-png-copy {
    width: 25px;
    height: 25px;
    background-position: -5px -194px;
}

.sprite-vk-icon-png-copy {
    width: 26px;
    height: 15px;
    background-position: -5px -229px;
}
